 37// Forward.
 38template <dimension_type Dim,
 39	  typename       MapT>
 40class Create_par_expr;
 41
 42// Forward.
 43template <dimension_type Dim,
 44	  typename       MapT,
 45	  typename       BlockT>
 46typename Combine_return_type<Create_par_expr<Dim, MapT>, BlockT>::type
 47get_par_expr_block(
 48  MapT const&   map,
 49  BlockT const& block);
 50
 51
 52
 53template <dimension_type Dim,
 54	  typename       MapT,
 55	  typename       BlockT>
 56class Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reorg_tag> : Non_copyable
 57{
 58public:
 59  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
 60
 61  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
 62  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
 63  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
 64  typedef MapT                                  map_type;
 65
 66  // The layout of the reorg block should have the same dimension-
 67  // order and complex format as the source block.  Packing format
 68  // should either be unit-stride-dense or unit-stride-aligned.
 69  // It should not be taken directly from BlockT since it may have
 70  // a non realizable packing format such as Stride_unknown.
 71  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type        order_type;
 72  typedef Stride_unit_dense                                pack_type;
 73  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type      complex_type;
 74  typedef Layout<Dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
 75
 76  typedef Strided<Dim, value_type, layout_type>  local_block_type;
 77  typedef Distributed_block<local_block_type, MapT> dst_block_type;
 78
 79  typedef typename View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
 80                                                local_block_ret_type;
 81
 82  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, dst_block_type>::type
 83		dst_view_type;
 84  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, BlockT>::const_type
 85		src_view_type;
 86
 87  typedef typename
 88    Choose_par_assign_impl<Dim, dst_block_type, BlockT, false>::type
 89    par_assign_type;
 90
 91
 92public:
 93  Par_expr_block(MapT const& map, BlockT const& block);
 94  ~Par_expr_block() {}
 95
 96  void exec() { this->assign_(); }
 97
 98  // Accessors.
 99public:
100  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return src_.block().size(); }
101  length_type size(dimension_type blk_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
102  { return src_.block().size(blk_dim, d); }
103
104  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
105  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
106
107  // Distributed Accessors
108public:
109  local_block_type& get_local_block() const
110    { return dst_block_->get_local_block(); }
111
112  // Member data.
113private:
114  MapT const&     map_;
115  Domain<Dim>     dom_;
116  Ref_counted_ptr<dst_block_type> dst_block_;
117  dst_view_type   dst_;
118  src_view_type   src_;
119  Par_assign<Dim, value_type, value_type, dst_block_type, BlockT,
120             par_assign_type>
121		  assign_;
122};
123
124
125
126template <dimension_type Dim,
127	  typename       MapT,
128	  typename       BlockT>
129class Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reuse_tag> : Non_copyable
130{
131public:
132  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
133
134  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
135  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
136  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
137  typedef MapT                                  map_type;
138
139
140  typedef BlockT const                              local_block_type;
141  typedef typename View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
142                                                local_block_ret_type;
143  typedef Distributed_block<local_block_type, MapT> dst_block_type;
144
145  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, dst_block_type>::type
146		dst_view_type;
147  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, BlockT>::const_type
148		src_view_type;
149
150
151public:
152  Par_expr_block(MapT const& map, BlockT const& block)
153    : map_ (map),
154      blk_ (const_cast<BlockT&>(block))
155  {}
156
157  ~Par_expr_block() {}
158
159  void exec() {}
160
161  // Accessors.
162public:
163  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return blk_.size(); }
164  length_type size(dimension_type blk_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
165  { return blk_.size(blk_dim, d); }
166
167  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
168  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
169
170  // Distributed Accessors
171public:
172  local_block_type& get_local_block() const
173    { return blk_; }
174
175  // Member data.
176private:
177  MapT const&     map_;
178  typename View_block_storage<BlockT>::expr_type blk_;
179};
180
181
182
183template <dimension_type Dim,
184	  typename       MapT,
185	  typename       BlockT>
186struct Is_sized_block<Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reuse_tag> >
187{ static bool const value = Is_sized_block<BlockT>::value; };

190
191template <typename RetBlock>
192struct Create_subblock;
193
194template <typename BlockT>
195struct Create_subblock<Subset_block<BlockT> >
196{
197  template <typename MapT>
198  static Subset_block<BlockT> exec(MapT const& map, BlockT const& blk)
199  {
200    dimension_type const dim = BlockT::dim;
201    return Subset_block<BlockT>
202      (map.template impl_global_domain<dim>(map.subblock(),0),blk);
203  }
204};
205
206template <typename MapT, typename BlockT>
207struct Create_subblock<Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT> >
208{
209  static Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT> exec(MapT const& map, BlockT const& blk)
210  {
211    return Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT>(blk,map);
212  }
213};
214
215template <typename MapT, typename BlockT>
216struct Choose_local_block;
217
218template <typename BlockT, dimension_type Dim>
219struct Choose_local_block<Replicated_map<Dim>, BlockT>
220{
221  typedef Subset_block<BlockT> block_type;
222};
223
224template <typename BlockT, dimension_type Dim>
225struct Choose_local_block<Global_map<Dim>, BlockT>
226{
227  typedef Subset_block<BlockT> block_type;
228};
229
230template <typename BlockT>
231struct Choose_local_block<Map<Block_dist,Block_dist,Block_dist>, BlockT>
232{
233  typedef Subset_block<BlockT> block_type;
234};
235
236template <typename MapT, typename BlockT>
237struct Choose_local_block
238{
239  typedef Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT> block_type;
240};

243template <dimension_type Dim,
244	  typename       MapT,
245	  typename       BlockT>
246class Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_remap_tag> : Non_copyable
247{
248public:
249  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
250
251  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
252  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
253  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
254  typedef MapT                                  map_type;
255
256
257  typedef typename Choose_local_block<MapT, BlockT const>::block_type
258                                                local_block_type;
259  typedef typename View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
260                                                local_block_ret_type;
261
262public:
263  Par_expr_block(MapT const& map, BlockT const& block)
264    : map_     (map),
265      blk_     (block),
266      subblock_(Create_subblock<local_block_type>::exec(map_,blk_))
267  {}
268
269  ~Par_expr_block() {}
270
271  void exec() {}
272
273  // Accessors.
274public:
275  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return blk_.size(); }
276  length_type size(dimension_type blk_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
277  { return blk_.size(blk_dim, d); }
278
279  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
280  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
281
282  // Distributed Accessors
283public:
284  local_block_ret_type get_local_block() const
285  {
286    return subblock_;
287  }
288
289
290  // Member data.
291private:
292  MapT const&                                          map_;
293  typename View_block_storage<BlockT const>::expr_type blk_;
294  local_block_type                                     subblock_;
295};
296
297
298/// 'Combine' functor to construct an expression of Par_expr_blocks from an
299/// expression of distributed blockes.
300
301/// get_par_expr_block() is a convenience function to apply this
302/// functor.
303
304template <dimension_type Dim,
305	  typename       MapT>
306class Create_par_expr
307{
308public:
309  template <typename BlockT>
310  struct tree_type
311  {
312    typedef Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> type;
313  };
314
315  template <typename BlockT>
316  struct return_type
317  {
318    typedef Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>& type;
319  };
320
321  // Constructors.
322public:
323  Create_par_expr(MapT const& map) : map_(map) {}
324
325  // Leaf combine function.
326  template <typename BlockT>
327  typename return_type<BlockT>::type
328  apply(BlockT const& block) const
329  {
330    return *(new Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>(map_, block));
331  }
332
333  // Member data.
334private:
335  MapT const& map_;
336
337};
338
339
340
341/// 'Visitor' functor to call 'exec()' member function for each
342/// leaf in an expression.
343
344/// Expected to be used on expressions of Par_expr_blocks.
345
346class Exec_par_expr
347{
348  // Constructors.
349public:
350  Exec_par_expr() {}
351
352  // Leaf visitor function.
353  template <typename BlockT>
354  void
355  apply(BlockT const& block) const
356  {
357    // const_cast necessary because Expr_binary_block accessors for
358    // left() and right() return const.
359    const_cast<BlockT&>(block).exec();
360  }
361};
362
363
364
365/// 'Visitor' functor to delete each leaf block in an expression.
366
367/// Expected to be used on expressions of Par_expr_blocks.
368
369class Free_par_expr
370{
371  // Constructors.
372public:
373  Free_par_expr() {}
374
375  // Leaf visitor function.
376  template <typename BlockT>
377  void
378  apply(BlockT const& block) const
379  {
380    delete &block;
381  }
382};
383
384
385
386/// Represent and evaluate a parallel expression.
387template <dimension_type Dim,
388	  typename       DstBlock,
389	  typename       SrcBlock>
390class Par_expr
391{
392  // Compile-time values and typedefs.
393  typedef typename DstBlock::value_type value1_type;
394  typedef typename SrcBlock::value_type value2_type;
395
396  typedef typename DstBlock::map_type   dst_map_type;
397  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<DstBlock>::type dst_lblock_type;
398
399  typedef typename
400    Combine_return_type<Create_par_expr<Dim, dst_map_type>, SrcBlock>
401    ::tree_type src_peb_type;
402
403  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<src_peb_type>::type src_lblock_type;
404
405  // Constructors
406public:
407  Par_expr(
408    typename View_of_dim<Dim, value1_type, DstBlock>::type       dst,
409    typename View_of_dim<Dim, value2_type, SrcBlock>::const_type src)
410  : dst_      (dst),
411    src_remap_(get_par_expr_block<Dim>(dst.block().map(), src.block()))
412  {}
413
414  ~Par_expr()
415  { free_par_expr_block(src_remap_.block()); }
416
417  void operator()()
418  {
419    typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value1_type, dst_lblock_type>::type
420		dst_lview_type;
421    typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value2_type, src_lblock_type>::const_type
422		src_lview_type;
423
424    // Reorganize data to owner-computes
425    exec_par_expr_block(src_remap_.block());
426
427    DstBlock&      dst_block = dst_.block();
428
429    if (dst_block.map().subblock() != no_subblock)
430    {
431      dst_lview_type dst_lview = get_local_view(dst_);
432      src_lview_type src_lview = get_local_view(src_remap_);
433      
434#if 0
435      // This is valid if the local view is element conformant to the
436      // union of patches in corresponding subblock.
437      //
438      // Subset_maps do not meet this requirement currently.
439      // (061212).
440      dst_lview = src_lview;
441#else
442      typedef typename DstBlock::map_type map_type;
443      map_type const& map = dst_block.map();
444
445      index_type sb = map.subblock();
446
447      for (index_type p=0; p<map.impl_num_patches(sb); ++p)
448      {
449	Domain<Dim> dom = map.template impl_local_domain<Dim>(sb, p);
450	dst_lview(dom) = src_lview(dom);
451      }
452#endif
453    }
454  }
455
456  // Member data.
457private:
458  typename View_of_dim<Dim, value1_type, DstBlock>::type           dst_;
459  typename View_of_dim<Dim, value2_type, src_peb_type>::const_type src_remap_;
460};
461
462
463
464/// Specialize Distributed_local_block traits class for Par_expr_block.
465template <dimension_type Dim,
466	  typename       MapT,
467	  typename       BlockT>
468struct Distributed_local_block<Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> >
469{
470  typedef typename Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>::local_block_type
471		type;
472  typedef typename Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>::local_block_type
473		proxy_type;
474};
475
476
477
478#if VSIP_IMPL_USE_GENERIC_VISITOR_TEMPLATES==0
479
480/// Determine return type for combining a leaf Par_expr_block.
481template <typename       CombineT,
482	  dimension_type Dim,
483	  typename       MapT,
484	  typename       BlockT>
485struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> >
486{
487  typedef Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> block_type;
488  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
489		type;
490  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
491		tree_type;
492};
493
494
495
496/// Specialize apply_combine for Par_expr_block leaves.
497template <typename       CombineT,
498	  dimension_type Dim,
499	  typename       MapT,
500	  typename       BlockT>
501typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
502			     Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> >::type
503apply_combine(
504  CombineT const&                          combine,
505  Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> const& block)
506{
507  return combine.apply(block);
508}
509
510
511
512/// Specialize apply_leaf for Par_expr_block leaves.
513template <typename       VisitorT,
514	  dimension_type Dim,
515	  typename       MapT,
516	  typename       BlockT>
517void
518apply_leaf(
519  VisitorT const&                          visitor,
520  Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> const& block)
521{
522  visitor.apply(block);
523}
524#endif
525
526
527
528/***********************************************************************
529  Definitions
530***********************************************************************/
531
532template <dimension_type Dim,
533	  typename       MapT,
534	  typename       BlockT>
535Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reorg_tag>::Par_expr_block(
536  MapT const&   map,
537  BlockT const& block)
538  : map_      (map),
539    dom_      (block_domain<Dim>(block)),
540    dst_block_(new dst_block_type(dom_, map_), noincrement),
541    dst_      (*dst_block_),
542    src_      (const_cast<BlockT&>(block)),
543    assign_   (dst_, src_)
544{
545}
546
547
548
549/// Overload of get_local_block for Par_expr_block.
550template <dimension_type Dim,
551	  typename       MapT,
552	  typename       BlockT,
553	  typename       ImplTag>
554typename Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, ImplTag>::local_block_ret_type
555get_local_block(
556  Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, ImplTag> const& block)
557{
558  return block.get_local_block();
559}
560
561
562
563/// Convert an expression of distributed blocks into an expression
564/// of Par_expr_blocks
565template <dimension_type Dim,
566	  typename       MapT,
567	  typename       BlockT>
568typename Combine_return_type<Create_par_expr<Dim, MapT>, BlockT>::type
569get_par_expr_block(
570  MapT const&   map,
571  BlockT const& block)
572{
573  Create_par_expr<Dim, MapT> combine(map);
574  return apply_combine(combine, block);
575}
576
577
578
579/// Perform data reorganization for an expression of Par_expr_blocks
580template <typename BlockT>
581void
582exec_par_expr_block(
583  BlockT const& block)
584{
585  Exec_par_expr visitor;
586  apply_leaf(visitor, block);
587}
588
589
590
591/// Deallocate leaf Par_expr_blocks in expression.
592template <typename BlockT>
593void
594free_par_expr_block(
595  BlockT const& block)
596{
597  Free_par_expr visitor;
598  apply_leaf(visitor, block);
599}
600
601
602
603
604/// Evaluate a parallel expression where LHS and RHS have same mapping.
605///
606/// Arguments:
607///   :dst: a distributed, non-const view to assign to.
608///   :src: a distributed view of the same dimension as DST that holds
609///         the values to assign into DST.
610template <template <typename, typename> class View1,
611	  template <typename, typename> class View2,
612	  typename                            T1,
613	  typename                            Block1,
614	  typename                            T2,
615	  typename                            Block2>
616void
617par_expr_simple(View1<T1, Block1> dst,
618		View2<T2, Block2> src)
619{
620  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((View1<T1, Block1>::dim == View2<T2, Block2>::dim));
621
622  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type dst_lblock_type;
623  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type src_lblock_type;
624
625  // Already checked by Dispatch_assign prior to calling:
626  //
627  // assert(Is_par_same_map<map_t, Block2>::value(dst.block().map(),
628  //                                              src.block()));
629
630  View1<T1, dst_lblock_type> dst_lview = get_local_view(dst);
631  View2<T2, src_lblock_type> src_lview = get_local_view(src);
632
633  dst_lview = src_lview;
634}
635
636
637
638/// Evaluate a parallel expression where LHS and RHS have different
639/// mappings.
640///
641/// Arguments:
642///   :dst: a distributed, non-const view to assign to.
643///   :src: a distributed view of the same dimension as DST that holds
644///         the values to assign into DST.
645template <template <typename, typename> class View1,
646	  template <typename, typename> class View2,
647	  typename                            T1,
648	  typename                            Block1,
649	  typename                            T2,
650	  typename                            Block2>
651void
652par_expr(View1<T1, Block1> dst,
653	 View2<T2, Block2> src)
654{
655  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((View1<T1, Block1>::dim == View2<T2, Block2>::dim));
656  dimension_type const dim = View1<T1, Block1>::dim;
657
658  Par_expr<dim, Block1, Block2> par_expr(dst, src);
659
660  par_expr();
661}
662
663} // namespace vsip::impl
664} // namespace vsip
